name: Clockwork Dragon
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.False Appearance: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Fire Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
